seo.title: Contact - Filecoin Foundation for the Decentralized Web

og.site_name: Contact - Filecoin Foundation for the Decentralized Web

col_1.description: We support and fund research and development, and educate people about the decentralized web, in order to preserve humanity’s most important information. Interested in joining us in this mission? Reach out.

col_1.heading: Contact
col_1.description: Questions? Ideas? Drop us a line hello@ffweb.org

col_3.heading: Careers
col_3.description: Our team of thinkers and doers is growing. If you’re passionate about advancing technology forward, we want to hear from you.
